name: HoldRequestResultConsumer
description: PHP Lambda processing Hold Request Results and send e-mail notificaitons.

scripts.deploy-dev: node-lambda deploy -e development -f config/var_dev.env -S config/event_sources_dev.json -b subnet-f4fe56af -g sg-1d544067
scripts.deploy-qa: node-lambda deploy -e qa -f config/var_qa.env -S config/event_sources_qa.json -b subnet-f4fe56af -g sg-1d544067
scripts.deploy-production: node-lambda deploy -e production -f config/var_production.env -S config/event_sources_production.json -g sg-116eeb60
